completion:
ronan loughney -lrb- born 1 november 1984 -rrb- is a professional rugby union player from ireland .
he plays as a prop .
having started his career playing at loosehead , loughney now plays primarily at tighthead .
loughney currently plays for irish provincial side connacht in the pro12 .
loughney is also an international player , having made his debut for against new zealand in 2012 .
